thought: To build the workflow, I need to define the necessary functions first: a manual trigger, a Google Sheets read action, an AI completion action for classification, a Slack message send action, and a Gmail send action.
plan: Define a manual trigger to start the workflow
Define a Google Sheets read action to read commercial entries
Define an AI completion action to classify each Description
Define a Slack message send action to send 'to Business' entries
Define a Gmail send action to send 'to Customer' entries
criticism: The main challenge is to correctly handle the data flow between Google Sheets, AI completion, Slack, and Gmail with proper parsing and filtering.

functions.comments: Send classified 'to Business' commercial entries to Slack channel #general.
Send classified 'to Customer' commercial entries via Gmail to specified email.
